response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which has been meticulously crafted and holds immense value, is now available for acquisition. We believe it is worth no less than $1,000,000 to us, reflecting its unique qualities and potential impact. Considering its exceptional nature, we are extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $950,000. This presents a remarkable chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
